interestingFact: Nepal is home to Mount Everest, the tallest mountain in the world, standing at 8,848 meters.
The Pyramids of Giza are one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.
Australia is home to the Great Barrier Reef, the largest coral reef system in the world.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest tropical rainforest in the world.
The Eiffel Tower in Paris was once the tallest man-made structure in the world.
Russia is the largest country in the world by area, covering more than 17 million square kilometres.
The Great Wall of China is visible from space on rare occasions.
India is the world's largest democracy and home to the ancient Indus Valley Civilization.
Japan is made up of over 6,800 islands and is known for its advanced technology and unique culture.
